official_title: A bill to implement the Coordinated Operation Agreement.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to execute and implement the "Agreement Between the United States and the Department of Water Resources of the State of California for Coordinated Operation of the Central Valley Project and the State Water Project" (dated May 8, 1985).

titles.title: A bill to implement the Coordinated Operation Agreement.
